$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|How long has it been since we last
fought in the arena? It brings back

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Valentine21,Face|Well done... We yield for now.$k$p$Sbs150|
